title: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to complete. During this process, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the system is working. Currently, a busy cursor is not shown.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to complete. Currently, a busy cursor is not shown.
EB: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to complete. A busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the system is working.
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Check and uncheck multiple checkboxes in the table.
3. Observe that it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) for the checked state to update.
4. Note that a busy cursor should be displayed during this process to indicate that the system is working.
